title: (Kevin Bacon) Two innocent outcasts. One incredible friendship - Digging to China 1997

sources.title: (Kevin Bacon) Two innocent outcasts. One incredible friendship - Digging to China 1997
sources.description:
10 y.o. Harriet's divorced mom owns and runs a motel. Harriet's an outsider and wants to leave. A woman stays there with her adult, disabled son who befriends Harriet.

Director: Timothy Hutton
Writer: Karen Janszen
Stars: Evan Rachel Wood, Kevin Bacon, Mary Stuart Masterson
Genre: Drama

Release date: September 7, 1997 
Budget: $5 million
Filming location: Connecticut, USA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYTMq_LE7cyJT3fio8pHOP8

@CultCinemaClassics
